abstract: Microsoft announced partnerships with Walt Disney, NBC Universal and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer to boost online video sales.
snippet: Microsoft announced partnerships with Walt Disney, NBC Universal and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer to boost online video sales.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft announced partnerships on Monday with Walt Disney, NBC Universal and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer to bolster online video sales and step up competition with the iTunes operation of Apple Inc.

abstract: Microsoft bid $1.2 billion for Fast Search and Transfer, based in Oslo, in an effort to add more tools to its lucrative Office products.
snippet: Microsoft bid $1.2 billion for Fast Search and Transfer, based in Oslo, in an effort to add more tools to its lucrative Office products.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft bid $1.2 billion on Tuesday for a Norwegian search software company in an effort to add more tools to its lucrative Office products. But it is also making the move with an eye toward Google, according to industry analysts.

headline.main: Microsoft Bids for Norwegian Search Engine Firm
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Bids for Norwegian Search Engine Firm

abstract: Microsoft agreed to buy Norwegian online-search software maker Fast Search & Transfer for 6.6 billion kroner ($1.23 billion) as it adds products that help companies mine information on the Internet.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft agreed to buy Norwegian online-search software maker Fast Search & Transfer for 6.6 billion kroner ($1.23 billion) as it adds products that help companies mine information on the Internet.

headline.main: Microsoft to Buy Norway’s Fast Search for $1.23 Billion

abstract: Microsoft’s $1.2 billion acquisition of Fast Search and Transfer, the Norwegian enterprise search vendor, may bolster its technology and its relationships with big companies and Web publishers.
snippet: Microsoft’s $1.2 billion acquisition of Fast Search and Transfer, the Norwegian enterprise search vendor, may bolster its technology and its relationships with big companies and Web publishers.
lead_paragraph: Now here is a deal from Microsoft that, at least on the face, makes some sense.

headline.main: A FAST Deal for Microsoft Search
